Descriptive.name: 详细描述
Descriptive.description: 生成详细的图片描述，包含主要元素和细节
prompts: Write a detailed description for this image.
Write a detailed description for this image in {word_count} words or less.
Write a {length} detailed description for this image.

Descriptive (Casual).name: 详细描述（轻松）
Descriptive (Casual).description: 生成轻松的详细描述，使用更自然的语调
prompts: Write a descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone.
Write a descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone within {word_count} words.
Write a {length} descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone.

Straightforward.name: 直接描述
Straightforward.description: 直接、客观的描述，专注于具体细节
prompts: Write a straightforward caption for this image. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements—people, objects, scenery—using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what's absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with "This image is…" or similar phrasing.

Write a straightforward caption for this image within {word_count} words. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements—people, objects, scenery—using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what's absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with "This image is…" or similar phrasing.

Write a {length} straightforward caption for this image. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements—people, objects, scenery—using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what's absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with "This image is…" or similar phrasing.

Stable Diffusion Prompt.name: Stable Diffusion提示词
Stable Diffusion Prompt.description: 生成适合Stable Diffusion的提示词
prompts: Output a stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt.
Output a stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt. {word_count} words or less.
Output a {length} stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt.

MidJourney.name: MidJourney提示词
prompts: Write a MidJourney prompt for this image.
Write a MidJourney prompt for this image within {word_count} words.
Write a {length} MidJourney prompt for this image.

Danbooru tag list.name: Danbooru标签列表
prompts: Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text.

Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text. {word_count} words or less.

Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text. {length} length.

e621 tag list.name: e621标签列表
prompts: Write a comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags.

Write a comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags. Keep it under {word_count} words.

Write a {length} comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags.

Rule34 tag list.name: Rule34标签列表
prompts: Write a comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags.

Write a comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags. Keep it under {word_count} words.

Write a {length} comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags.

Booru-like tag list.name: Booru风格标签列表
Booru-like tag list.description: 生成通用的Booru风格标签列表
prompts: Write a list of Booru-like tags for this image.
Write a list of Booru-like tags for this image within {word_count} words.
Write a {length} list of Booru-like tags for this image.

Art Critic.name: 艺术评论
Art Critic.description: 从艺术评论家的角度分析图片
prompts: Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc.

Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc. Keep it within {word_count} words.
Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc. Keep it {length}.

Product Listing.name: 产品列表
Product Listing.description: 生成产品列表风格的描述
prompts: Write a caption for this image as though it were a product listing.
Write a caption for this image as though it were a product listing. Keep it under {word_count} words.
Write a {length} caption for this image as though it were a product listing.

Social Media Post.name: 社交媒体帖子
Social Media Post.description: 生成适合社交媒体的描述
prompts: Write a caption for this image as if it were being used for a social media post.
Write a caption for this image as if it were being used for a social media post. Limit the caption to {word_count} words.
Write a {length} caption for this image as if it were being used for a social media post.

Simple Tags.name: 简单标签
Simple Tags.description: 生成简单的关键词标签
prompts: Generate simple, descriptive tags for this image.
Generate simple, descriptive tags for this image within {word_count} words.
Generate {length} simple, descriptive tags for this image.

refer_character_name.name: 引用角色名称
refer_character_name.description: 如果图片中有角色，必须使用{name}引用

exclude_unchangeable_attributes.name: 排除不可改变属性
exclude_unchangeable_attributes.description: 不包含不可改变的人物/角色信息（如种族、性别等），但包含可改变属性（如发型）

include_camera_details.name: 包含相机详情
include_camera_details.description: 如果是照片，必须包含可能使用的相机和光圈、快门速度、ISO等详细信息

keep_pg_rated.name: 保持PG级别
keep_pg_rated.description: 不包含任何性相关内容，保持PG级别

include_aesthetic_quality.name: 包含美学质量
include_aesthetic_quality.description: 必须包含从低到很高的主观美学质量信息

include_composition_style.name: 包含构图风格
include_composition_style.description: 包含图片构图风格信息，如引导线、三分法则或对称性

exclude_text.name: 排除文本
exclude_text.description: 不提及图片中的任何文本

specify_depth_field.name: 指定景深
specify_depth_field.description: 指定景深以及背景是否对焦或模糊

specify_lighting_sources.name: 指定光源
specify_lighting_sources.description: 如果适用，提及可能使用的人工或自然光源

include_nsfw.name: 包含NSFW
include_nsfw.description: 包含图片是否为sfw、暗示性或nsfw

only_describe_most_important_elements.name: 仅描述最重要元素
only_describe_most_important_elements.description: 仅描述图片中最重要的元素

do_not_include_artist_name_or_title.name: 不包含艺术家姓名或标题
do_not_include_artist_name_or_title.description: 如果是艺术作品，不包含艺术家姓名或作品标题

identify_image_orientation.name: 识别图片方向
identify_image_orientation.description: 识别图片方向（纵向、横向或方形）和明显的宽高比

use_vulgar_slang_and_profanity.name: 使用粗俗俚语和脏话
use_vulgar_slang_and_profanity.description: 使用粗俗俚语和脏话，如（但不限于）"fucking," "slut," "cock,"等

do_not_use_polite_euphemisms.name: 不使用礼貌委婉语
do_not_use_polite_euphemisms.description: 不使用礼貌委婉语——倾向于直率、随意的措辞

include_character_age.name: 包含角色年龄
include_character_age.description: 在适用时包含任何人物/角色的年龄信息

include_camera_shot_type.name: 包含相机镜头类型
include_camera_shot_type.description: 提及图片是否描绘特写、近景、中近景、中景、牛仔镜头、中远景、远景或极远景

exclude_mood_feeling.name: 排除情绪感受
exclude_mood_feeling.description: 不提及图片的情绪/感受等

include_camera_vantage_height.name: 包含相机视角高度
include_camera_vantage_height.description: 明确指定视角高度（眼平、低角度虫眼、鸟瞰、无人机、屋顶等）

avoid_meta_descriptive_phrases.name: 避免元描述短语
avoid_meta_descriptive_phrases.description: 您的回答将被文本到图像模型使用，所以避免无用的元短语，如"This image shows…", "You are looking at..."等
